The inside of that hatch ended up in a busy tunnel. Four armed guards
watched over the passage. Civilians roamed everywhere, bringing goods
and materials to the base, and packing small freighters in the
shipping docks.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "You'd think they'd make a bigger door."  He commented before 
> changing into his beast mode and crawling through the hatch.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > Sentry: Remain still.
> > 
> > The sentry quickly run a scanner on Quickstrike. It showed nothing
> > wrong with him, and he was definetely not a Minion.
> > 
> > Behind the guns, a small hatch opened, allowing entry to 
> Quickstrike.
> > 
> > Sentry: You are clear, but we strongly advise that you continue
> > behaving. Please proceed.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > Quickstrike took a step back in surprise when he saw how large 
> the 
> > > guns are.'Now these are by kinda people alright'.
> > > "Why I'm Quickstrike.  The toughest bot around.  I saw lookin' 
> to 
> > > see if ya had an opening."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > > > As he said that, three gun batteries the size of an 18-wheeler 
> each
> > > > swung in line with him, ready to fire at the first sign of 
> > > agressivity
> > > > or defiance. The only thing was that the Iron Skulls had a 
> very 
> > > loose
> > > > definition of those words.
> > > > 
> > > > Sentry: You have trespassed on protected territory. Decline 
> your
> > > > identity, and refrain from any inappropriate actions.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > >  Quickstrike had been wandering the various cities of this 
> > > planet 
> > > > >  disgusted at all of the weaklings he ran across.  But now 
> he 
> > > had heard 
> > > > >  of people just as tough as he (thought that he) was. He 
> held a 
> > > map up 
> > > > >  showing the way to the Iron Skull base.
> > > > >  "He ya!  I found it!  You ready to kick some tail?"  He 
> asked 
> > > his 
> > > > >  snake head as if it were someone else.
> > > > >  "I"m a guess'in I just go up and knock." He said to himself 
> as 
> > > he 
> > > > >  walked up to the iron doors of their base.
> > > > >  "Anyone home!?"  He called.
